page.title: 03A TYPICAL DAY (Part 1)
page.content: At approximately 7.00 a.m every day I get out of bed. It usually takes me about 2 minutes to fully wake up but I am nearly always dressed by 7.10 a.m. I go downstairs and get washed at 7.15 a.m and by 7.30 I am tucking in to my breakfast. Then I put the T.V. on until 8.30 when I go and call for my friend Darren Lidster. He is never ready so it is about 8.35 before we set off for school. When we get to school I have a game of football and Darren goes to see his friends. My favourite lessons are History and Project. I also enjoy doing a crossword. At playtime I play football with Carl, Paul and Andrew. At dinner time I have my packed lunch and then I go into Mr. Farms' classroom to play "Snapper " on the computer.Paul sometimes comes with me. {continued
